data.lyric:
[ti:865]
[ar:Morgan Wallen]
[al:Dangerous: The Double Album (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]865 - Morgan Wallen
[00:03.80]Lyrics by：John Byron/Blake Pendergrass
[00:07.60]Composed by：John Byron/Blake Pendergrass
[00:11.41]Jack D there's a seven on the label
[00:14.10]One glass on the living room table
[00:16.81]Phone face down church up loud
[00:19.33]Was trying to drown you out tonight
[00:21.50]But first sip I could feel you on my shoulder
[00:24.77]The Tennessee heat had me feelin' colder
[00:27.67]Thought a drink would get you off my mind but
[00:31.11]This bottle tastes like 865-409-1021
[00:37.94]Yeah one last time don't think twice
[00:41.68]Girl just pick it up and come over
[00:44.75]Give the bedroom door a little closure
[00:47.78]I know I told you I wouldn't call and I tried
[00:52.68]But this bottle tastes like 865
[00:56.81]409-1021
[00:58.47]This bottle tastes like 865
[01:02.08]409-1021
[01:05.74]You might think I don't really want you with me
[01:08.40]You might tell me to empty out my whiskey
[01:11.10]Or try changing what I'm holdin' in my hand
[01:14.05]Try another liquor try another brand
[01:16.29]But it don't matter
[01:17.45]If I got my lips on a different drink on a different night
[01:22.17]Yeah the second that I take a sip all I'm gonna think is
[01:25.65]This bottle tastes like 865-409-1021
[01:32.41]Yeah one last time don't think twice
[01:36.20]Girl just pick it up and come over
[01:39.28]Give the bedroom door a little closure
[01:42.30]I know I told you I wouldn't call and I tried
[01:47.35]But this bottle tastes like 865
[01:51.18]409-1021
[01:52.85]This bottle tastes like 865
[01:56.76]409-1021
[02:00.37]Thought a drink would get you off my mind
[02:05.68]I ain't sayin' I love you but I might 'cause
[02:09.28]This bottle tastes like 865-409-1021
[02:16.02]Yeah one last time don't think twice
[02:19.86]Girl just pick it up and come over
[02:22.87]Give the bedroom door a little closure
[02:25.89]I know I told you I wouldn't call and I tried
[02:30.85]But this bottle tastes like 865
[02:34.82]409-1021
[02:36.55]This bottle tastes like 865
[02:40.35]409-1021
[02:42.15]This bottle tastes like 865
[02:45.82]409-1021
[02:47.66]This bottle tastes like 865
[02:51.54]409-1021
data.trans:
[ti:865]
[ar:Morgan Wallen]
[al:Dangerous: The Double Album (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:03.80]//
[00:07.60]//
[00:11.41]Jack D 标签上有个数字七
[00:14.10]客厅的桌子上有个酒杯
[00:16.81]电话朝下扣住 铃声打破寂静
[00:19.33]今夜试图将你淹没在酒精里
[00:21.50]但第一口酒下肚 我似乎就感觉到你靠在我的肩头
[00:24.77]田纳西州的热量让我更觉得冷
[00:27.67]以为酒精可以让我把你从脑海中赶走
[00:31.11]喝下这瓶酒就联想起那串数字865-409-1021
[00:37.94]是的 最后一次 以后不要再想
[00:41.68]女孩 接起电话 到我这儿来
[00:44.75]把卧室的门关上一点
[00:47.78]我知道我跟你说过我不会打来 我也做过尝试
[00:52.68]但喝下这瓶酒就联想起那串数字865
[00:56.81]//
[00:58.47]喝下这瓶酒就联想起那串数字865
[01:02.08]//
[01:05.74]你可能会觉得我不是真心想要得到你
[01:08.40]你可能会让我 要么喝光我的威士忌
[01:11.10]要么换一换我拿在手里的东西
[01:14.05]尝一尝别的酒 尝一尝别的牌子
[01:16.29]但没关系
[01:17.45]如果我的嘴唇尝过了不一样的酒精 经历了不一样的夜晚
[01:22.17]是的 在我张口喝下的那刻 我满脑子都是
[01:25.65]喝下这瓶酒就联想起那串数字865-409-1021
[01:32.41]最后一次 以后不要再想
[01:36.20]女孩 接起电话 到我这儿来
[01:39.28]把卧室的门关上一点
[01:42.30]我知道我跟你说过我不会打来 我也做过尝试
[01:47.35]但喝下这瓶酒就联想起那串数字865
[01:51.18]//
[01:52.85]喝下这瓶酒就联想起那串数字865
[01:56.76]//
[02:00.37]以为酒精可以让我把你从脑海中赶走
[02:05.68]我没有说我爱你 但我或许表达了这层含义
[02:09.28]喝下这瓶酒就联想起那串数字865-409-1021
[02:16.02]最后一次 以后不要再想
